content: Hello! This is XYZ Home Services. I understand you need plumbing help. Can I start by getting your name, please?
Thank you, Jane. Could you please provide the address where the plumbing service is needed?
Thanks, Jane. I just need to confirm you're within our service area. One moment…
You're in our service area. When would be an ideal time for our plumber to visit? Please specify a date and time.
Um, I’m not sure right now. I need to check my calendar, but I don’t have it handy at the moment. Can I get back to you?
Of course, Jane. Feel free to reach out when you have a time in mind. I'll be here to help you schedule your service. Have a great day!
reason: Customer unable to provide scheduling time and did not continue conversation.
